name: Milky Way Bowling
description:
***Note... Still in development!***

Please add any feedback or comments below, so I can fix them or improve on them in the next release. Thank you.

Welcome to Milky Way Bowling, a bowling simulator where you get to bowl with Jupiter. It's free, has a fun space theme, and lets you click, drag, and release to adjust your bowl speed.

Can you get a better score than you get in real life? Try this free HTML5 game and see!

This is an early test of game development and design. All thoughts, comments, and feedback are welcome! Thank you for playing.

Thanks: Milky Way Bowling came from this excellent Unity course on Udemy, taught by the glorious Ben Tristem and Brice Fernandes.
